TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 包含行标头单元格和列标头单元格常用的功能。

span.span: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是基类的其他标头单元格类，如和。This class is a base class for other header cell classes, such as and . 若要创建自定义行标题图标或列标头标志符号，请从继承类，并添加功能来绘制您自己的图标或字形。To create custom row header icons or column header glyphs, inherit from the class and add functionality to paint your own icon or glyph.

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

span.span: Gets the buttonlike visual state of the header cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个，可以单击它来设置状态，例如排序或执行行级选中内容是类似于按钮。A is like a button in that it can be clicked to set states, such as sorting or performing row-level selection. 属性使用值，以提供类似按钮的视觉状态。The property uses values to provide buttonlike visual states.

An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法时从派生并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 重写时派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制的派生类中添加的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关启用视觉样式的信息，请参阅方法。For information about enabling visual styles, see the method. 之前调用。 is called just before . 它必须返回`true`如果在调用起的行取消共享已`rowIndex`。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`. 它应返回`false`否则为。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该单元格为行标头单元格，则如果其行是可见的它会显示与属性是`true`。If the cell is a row header cell, then it is visible if its row is visible and the property is `true`. 如果该单元格是列标题单元格，则它是可见的如果其列可见并属性是`true`。If the cell is a column header cell, then it is visible if its column is visible and the property is `true`. 如果该单元格的左上方标头单元格，为时两个可见和成立。If the cell is the top left header cell, it is visible if both and are true.
